alert.note: Alert for Lewis and Southern Nez Perce Counties (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 16 at 2:16PM MST until December 17 at 1:00AM MST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT PST TONIGHT CAMAS PRAIRIE ABOVE 3000 FEET... * WHAT...Snow expected Camas Prairie above 3000 feet. Total snow accumulations between 1 and 3 inches. * WHERE...Nezperce, Soldiers Meadow Road, Craigmont, and Winchester. * WHEN...Until Midnight PST tonight. * IMPACTS...Plan on winter driving conditions this evening.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Lewis and Southern Nez Perce Counties
